function x(a, b) {     result = String(result).replace(a, b); } //debug function d(debug) {     java.log(debug);     java.log(result); } //同时加载多章时，自动验证成功后有的页面加载失败时重新获取 if(/.*1234/.test(src)){     //重新设置正文解析内容     java.setContent(java.ajax(baseUrl)); } //获取正文内容 result = java.getString('.page-content@tag.p.0@html'); //ci修改 resultFirst = java.getString('.neirong@html'); //大概第四页正文有切割，需要调接口获取这一页剩余正文 if (/\$.post\('',{'j':'1'}/.test(src)) {     result += java.ajax(String(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify({         "method": "POST",         "body": "j=1"     }))) } //d("正文"+baseUrl) //有问题修改下面正则 两个br标签换行显示 x(/((\s*)
\n?){2}/g,"

"); //d('1.0:') x(//g,""); try {     // Aes解密     secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/);     string = secret[1]     code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]);     iv = code.substring(0, 16);     key = code.substring(16);     //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key)     result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) {     try {         // 乱序恢复         ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(',');         //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok")         paragraphArr = result.split('

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.kind:
<js>
let tags=[];
try{tags=String(java.getElement('@@script')[0]).match(/.*[tags]+\: \'(.*?)\|\'.*/)[0].replace(/.*[tags]+\: \'(.*?)\|\'.*/,'$1').split('\|');}catch(error){let tag='';}
tags.push(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.2').text()).match(/(连载|全本)/)[0]);
tags.push(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.3').text()).replace('更新：',''));
tags.unshift(String(java.getElement('@@class.booknav2.0@p.1').text()).replace('分类：',''));
tags</js>
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）|第二更在.*|loadAdv.*
ruleContent.title: h1@text

ruleSearch.author: tag.label.0@text||div.0@class.labelbox@label.0@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var x=baseUrl;
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证").body()
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
result
</js>
